title: 50  Kurt Schwitters, Mz 13 Call, 1919
publication_title: The Modern Series at the Art Institute of Chicago
content:
<section class="osci-tk-epub-section tombstone" id="tombstone">50  
Kurt Schwitters (German, 1887–1948)  
Mz 13 Call  
1919  
Collage composed of pen and black ink, brush and black wash, blue crayon and graphite, on a variety of cut wove paper elements, laid down on tan card; 180 × 146 mm  
Gift of Mr. and Mrs. Maurice E. Culberg, 1953.24

</section><section id="figures">Kurt Schwitters, Mz 13 Call, 1919.

</section>
